and

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM event

and

SELECT eventNum, name FROM event
WHERE TO_DATE(eDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= SYSDATE AND (eventNum > #{eventNum})
WHERE TO_DATE(eDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= SYSDATE AND (TO_DATE(eDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_DATE(#{eDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
WHERE TO_DATE(eDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < SYSDATE AND (eventNum > #{eventNum})
WHERE TO_DATE(eDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < SYSDATE AND (TO_DATE(eDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_DATE(#{eDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
ORDER BY eventNum ASC
ORDER BY ABS(TO_DATE(eDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')-SYSDATE) DESC
FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT eventNum, name FROM event
WHERE TO_DATE(eDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= SYSDATE AND (eventNum < #{eventNum})

WHERE TO_DATE(eDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < SYSDATE AND (eventNum < #{eventNum})
